rewards.32: Début Transcension/Challenges avec la alchemy automatique-acheteuse débloqué.

rewards.35: Gain 25% more Offerings from resets (stacks multiplicatively!) || +1 Accelerator Boost per 2,000 Alchemies!

rewards.47: Reduce tax scaling by up to ANOTHER 10%, depending on length of Prestige!

rewards.51: Manual Reincarnations give +4 Obtainium (unaffected by multipliers except time multiplier)!
rewards.52: Reincarnations give more Offerings based on time spent (Up to +25 at 1800 seconds)

rewards.72: +1% Conversion Exponent on all generator upgrades!

rewards.76: +1% Conversion Exponent on all generator upgrades!
rewards.77: +1% Conversion Exponent on all generator upgrades! They're in overdrive now!

rewards.87: Start Transcensions/Challenges with Accelerator Autobuyer unlocked. +5% Offering recycle.

rewards.92: Start Transcensions/Challenges with 1 Coal Rig and automatically buy Coal Rigs.
rewards.93: Automatically buy the third Crystal upgrade if you can afford it!
rewards.98: +5% Obtainium (stacks additively with other achievement rewards)
rewards.99: Start Transcensions/Challenges with 1 Diamond Pickaxe and automatically buy Diamond Pickaxes.
rewards.100: Automatically buy the fourth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it!

rewards.107: Automatically buy the fifth Crystal upgrade if you can afford it!
rewards.112: +9% Obtainium (stacks additively with other achievement rewards)
rewards.118: Each Reincarnation Challenge completion delays tax growth by 0.75% per level, multiplicative. Effect: {{x}}x
rewards.119: +11% Obtainium. Unlock a nice trinket somewhere...
rewards.124: Delay tax growth by 5.66%. Unlock 5 new incredibly powerful researches!
rewards.126: +13% Obtainium. You get an accessory to commemorate this moment!
rewards.127: Unlock 20 new incredibly expensive yet good researches. Unlock the [Anthill] feature!

rewards.133: +15% Obtainium. Obtain the gift of Midas himself.

rewards.135: Talisman positive bonuses are now +0.02 stronger per level.
rewards.136: Talisman positive bonuses are now +0.02 even stronger per level.
rewards.140: +17% Obtainium. Lazy joke about not leaking talismans here [You get a new one]
rewards.141: Débloquez un nouveau palier de réinitialisation !
rewards.147: +19% Obtainium (Achievement total is up to 100%!). Gain the Polymath Talisman!
rewards.172: Gain more Ants the longer your Reincarnation lasts (Max speed achieved in 2 hours)
rewards.173: Unlock Ant Sacrifice, allowing you to reset your Ants and Ant upgrades in exchange for amazing rewards! Automatically buy Worker Ants.
rewards.174: Ant Multiplier from sacrifice is multiplied by another logarithm: x{{x}}
rewards.176: Unlock Tier 2 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Inceptus and Fortunae Ants! Add +25 Base Ant ELO.
rewards.177: Unlock Tier 3 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Tributum Ants! Add +50 Base Ant ELO.
rewards.178: Unlock Tier 4 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Celeritas and Multa Ants! Add +75 Base Ant ELO.
rewards.179: Unlock Tier 5 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Sacrificium Ants! Add +100 Base Ant ELO.
rewards.180: Unlock Tier 6 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Hic and Experientia Ants! Add +1% Base Ant ELO.
rewards.181: Unlock Tier 7 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Praemoenio Ants! Add +2% Base Ant ELO.
rewards.182: Unlock Tier 8 Ant autobuy, and autobuy Scientia and Phylacterium Ants! Add +3% Base Ant ELO.
rewards.187: Gain an Ascension Cubes multiplier based on your score: x{{x}}. Also: Offerings +{{y}}% [Max: 100% at 1M Ascensions]
rewards.188: Gain +100 Ascension count for all Ascensions longer than 10 seconds. Also: Obtainium +{{x}}% [Max: 100% at 5M Ascensions]
rewards.189: Gain 20% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascension as a linear multiplier to Ascension count. Also: Cubes +{{x}}% [Max: 200% at 500M Ascensions]
rewards.195: Gain {{x}}% more Cubes and Tesseracts on Ascension! Multiplicative with the other Ach. bonus [MAX: 25,000% at e100,000 Const]
rewards.196: Gain {{x}}% more Platonic Cubes on Ascension! [MAX: 2,000% at e100,000 Const]
rewards.197: You will unlock a stat tracker for Ascensions.
rewards.200: Gain +4% Cubs on Ascension! Did I spell that wrong? You bet I did.
rewards.202: Gain 20% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascensions as a linear multiplier to Ascension count. Also: Tesseracts +{{x}}% [Max: 200% at 1B Ascensions]
rewards.204: You will gain 25% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascension as a linear multiplier to rewards.
rewards.209: Gain 20% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascensions as a linear multiplier to Ascension count.
rewards.211: You will gain 25% MORE Excess time (Total: 50%) after 10 seconds each Ascension as a linear multiplier to rewards.
rewards.216: Gain 20% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascensions as a linear multiplier to Ascension count. Also: Hypercubes +{{x}}% [Max: 200% at 2B Ascensions]
rewards.218: You gain gain 50% MORE MORE excess time (Total: 100%) after 10 seconds each Ascension as a linear multiplier to rewards.
rewards.223: Gain 20% of Excess time after 10 seconds each Ascensions as a linear multiplier to Ascension count. Also: Platonic Cubes +{{x}}% [Max: 200% at 2.674B Ascensions]
rewards.240: Ascension Cube Gain Multipliers is VERY slightly affected by global speed multipliers: {{x}}x (Min: 1.10x, Max: 1.50x)
rewards.250: You gain a permanent +60% Obtainium and Offering bonus, with +6% all Cube types!
rewards.251: You gain a permanent +100% Obtainium and Offering bonus, with +10% all Cube types!
rewards.253: You will gain +10% Hypercubes! Why? I don't know.
rewards.255: Tesseract Gain +{{x}}% [Max: +15% at 1e25 Ascension Score], and allow gain of Hepteracts.
rewards.256: Hypercube Gain +{{x}}% [Max: +15% at 1e25 Ascension Score]. Also, Overflux Powder conversion rate is 5% better!
rewards.257: Platonic Gain +{{x}}% [Max: +15% at 1e25 Ascension Score]. Also, Overflux Powder conversion rate is 5% better!
rewards.259: Corruption score is increased by 1% for every expansion of Abyss Hepteract!
rewards.260: You will gain 10% more Ascension count, forever!
rewards.261: Vous allez gagner 10% d'ascension, pour toujours !
rewards.267: Ascension Score is boosted by {{x}}% [Max: 100% at 1e100,000 Const]
rewards.270: Hepteract Gain is boosted by {{x}}% [Max: 100% at 1e1,000,000 const], Constant Upgrade 1 boosted to 1.06 (from 1.05), Constant Upgrade 2 boosted to 1.11 (from 1.10).
rewards.271: When you open a Platonic Cube, gain {{x}} Hypercubes, rounded down [Max: 1 at 1e1,000,000 Const]
rewards.274: Ant Speed is permanently multiplied by 4.44! Platonic Upgrades now BuyMax whenever affordable!
rewards.275: You immediately start Singularities with 1 Transcension and 1001 mythos!
rewards.276: You immediately start Singularities with 1 Reincarnation, and 10 particles!
rewards.277: You immediately start Singularities with 500 Obtainium!
rewards.278: Gain 5% more Quarks, permanently! Automation regarding Particle Buildings are immediately available.
rewards.279: You immediately start Singularities with a Challenge 7 completion and 1e100 particles. Talismans now buff all runes at all times!
rewards.280: You immediately start Singularities with 1 Challenge 8 completion and 1 tier 1 Ant.

alerts.36: Congratulations on your first Prestige. The first of many. You obtain Offerings. You can use them in the new Runes tab! [Unlocked Runes, Achievements, Diamond Buildings and some Upgrades!]
alerts.38: Hmm, it seems you are getting richer, being able to get 1 Googol diamonds in a single Prestige. How about we give you another Rune? [Unlocked Duplication Rune in Runes tab!]
alerts.255: Wow! You gained 1e17 (100 Quadrillion) score in a single Ascension. For that, you can now generate Hepteracts if you get above 1.66e17 (166.6 Quadrillion) score in an Ascension. Good luck!

achievements.hover: Passez la souris sur une réalisation pour afficher des informations.

upgrades.1: Apporte romance et unité dans la colonie. [+12% vitesse des fourmis / niveau]
upgrades.2: Sucre les miettes pour augmenter leur valeur [Chaque niveau augmente l'efficacité de la conversion Miettes --> Pièce, Jusqu'à ^50.000.000]
upgrades.3: Soumettez le fisc grâce à l'essaim [jusqu'à -99,5% de taxes!]
upgrades.4: Vous effraie afin de courir plus vite [jusqu'à x20]
upgrades.5: Intimide votre corps avec des pouvoirs magiques de métamorphose [Jusqu'à x40]
upgrades.6: Essaye de satisfaire le Dieu Fourmi... mais ça ne fonctionne pas [Offrandes supplémentaires]
upgrades.7: Vous aides à construire des choses par-ci par-là [+3% de délai de coup de construction / niveau, Cap à 9.999.999%]
upgrades.8: Apprend comment saler et poivrer la nourriture [Jusqu'à x1000 EXP de rune!]
upgrades.9: Pouvez-vous faire un message plus clair au Dieu Fourmi ? [+1 niveau pour chaque rune / niveau, cap à 10 Million]
upgrades.10: A une grande énergie cérébrale [Obtainium supplémentaire !]
upgrades.11: Une offrande de valeur pour le Dieu Fourmi [Gagne jusqu'à 3x plus de récompense de sacrifice!]
upgrades.12: Trahir le Dieu Fourmi et fragiliser la dimension [Débloque le talisman Fourmi, Timer jusqu'à 2x plus rapide sur la plus par des choses]

descriptions.1: Gagnez une Fourmi Ouvrière pour votre vie de tout les jours. Récolte des Miettes cosmiques. Essentiel !
descriptions.2: Gagnez une Fourmi Éleveuse qui produit automatiquement des Fourmis Ouvrières !
descriptions.3: Gagnez une Meta-Fourmi Éleveuse qui produit automatiquement des Fourmis Éleveuses !
descriptions.4: Gagnez une Mega-Fourmi Éleveuse qui produit automatiquement des Meta-Fourmis Éleveuses !
descriptions.5: Gagnez une Reine Fourmi qui produit automatiquement des Mega-Fourmis Éleveuses !
descriptions.6: Gagnez un Seigneur Fourmi Royal qui produit automatiquement des Reines Fourmis !
descriptions.7: Gagnez une FOURMI TOUTE PUISSANTE qui produit automatiquement des Seigneur Fourmi Royal !
descriptions.8: Gagnez un DISCIPLE DU DIEU FOURMI qui produit automatiquement des FOURMIS TOUTES PUISSANTES !

ants.header: The ants welcome you to their home.
ants.hover: Hover over the icons for description. Click icons to buy!
ants.youHaveGalacticCrumbs: You have {{x}} Galactic Crumbs [{{y}}/s], providing a {{z}} Coin Multiplier
ants.sacrificeWhenTimer: Sacrifice when the timer is at least {{x}} seconds ({{y}}), Currently: {{z}}
ants.autoReset: This resets your Crumbs, Ants and Ant Upgrades in exchange for some multiplier and resources. Continue?

1.name: Défi sans Multiplicateurs || {{- value}} Complétions
1.flavor: Les multiplicateurs rendent le jeu un peu trop rapide. Sortons-les !
1.restrictions: Transcendez et atteignez l'objectif, sauf que les Multiplicateurs fonctionne comme des Accélérateurs, qui sont 50% moins efficace!

per.1: +10 Boosts de Multiplicateurs de base! [+0.05 à leur puissance!] Actuellement:
per.3: +0.04 EXP de rune de base par Offrande! Current:

1.first: +1 Multiplicateur gratuit! +1 EXP de base par offrande faite!

2.name: No Accelerators Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
2.flavor: Qui a besoin d'accélérateurs ? Ils ne font quasiment rien maintenant.
2.restrictions: Transcendez et atteignez l'objectif, sauf que les accélérateurs ne font rien! Les Multiplicateurs sont un aussi un peu moins puissant.

per.2: +5% de Puissance de Booster d'Accélérateur! Actuellement:

2.first: +1 Offrande de base par Prestige et Transcendance.

3.name: Défi sans Fragment || {{- value}} Complétions
3.flavor: D'accord, maintenant vous vous demandez, comment je peux rendre le jeu plus difficile?
3.restrictions: Transcendez et atteignez l'objectif, sauf que vous ne produisez pas de Cristaux ou d'éclats de Mythe.

per.1: Cristal --> Exposant de la conversion de Pièces +0.04 ! Actuel:
per.2: +0,5% à la production de Grand Maître par producteur de Mythos acheté. Actuel:
per.3: Lorsque vous utilisez une rune, toutes les autres runes gagnent +0.01 EXP. Current:

3.first: Gagnez une offrande automatiquement toutes les 2 secondes!

4.name: Défi Coût+ || {{- value}} Complétions
4.flavor: Vous êtes devenu riche mais l'inflation n'a pas encore eu lieu ? N'en soyez pas si sûr !
4.restrictions: Transcendez et atteignez l'objectif, sauf que les bâtiment de pièces et de crystal, ainsi que les accélérateurs et les multiplicateurs coûtent plus cher. [De plus en plus dur à chaque fois!]

per.1: Le coût des Accélérateurs augmente moins vite de 5 achats. Actuellement:
per.2: Le coût des multiplicateurs augmente moins vite de 2 achats. Actuellement:
per.3: Délai de coût de Construction +0,5%. Actuel:

5.name: Challenge Diamants Réduits || {{- value}} Completions
5.flavor: Vous êtes vous déjà demandez comment vous avez obtenu autant de diamants?
5.restrictions: Transcendez et atteingez l'objectif sauf que vous gagnez beaucoup moins de diamants de toute les sources. [De plus en plus dur à chaque fois!]

per.1: +0,01 à l'exposant de la conversion Pièce --> Diamant au prestige! Actuellement:
per.2: Multiplie la production de Crystal par 10! Actuellement:

6.name: Défi de Taxes Elevés || {{- value}} Completions
6.flavor: Le fiscaliste a eu vent que vous avez réincarné récemment...
6.restrictions: Réincarnez et atteignez l'objectif sauf que les tax
6.goal: But: Obtenir {{value}} Fragments Mythos dans le défi.

7.name: Pas de Multiplieurs/Accélérateurs Défi | {{- value}} Complétions
7.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except Accelerators and Multipliers do nothing. Coin Production is divided by 1e1,250.
7.goal: Objectif: Gagnez {{value}} Fragments de Mythos en défi.

per.2: EXP de Rune de Vitesse +10% ! Actuel:
per.3: EXP de Rune de Duplication +10%! Actuel:

7.first: Augmentation de la puissance du multiplicateur +25%! La première amélioration globale du diamant de Discord-Booster.

8.name: Défi Coût++ || {{- value}} Complétions
8.flavor: Vous pensiez pouvoir dépasser l'inflation en vous réincarnant ?
8.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except Cost Scaling for producers and Accelerators/Multipliers scale much, much faster.
8.goal: Objectif: Gagnez {{value}} éclats de Mythos en défi.
8.first: Débloquer la fonctionnalité Anthill! Inclut 20 nouvelles recherches, plus une amélioration global des diamants.

9.name: Défi sans Runes || {{- value}} Complétions
9.flavor: Vous ne vous plaindrez jamais que Prisme soit pire.
9.restrictions: Réincarnez et atteignez l'objectif sauf que les runes ont toujours des effets de niveau 1. Toute la production de pièces est divisée par e2,000,000.

per.2: +10% de vitesse de la fourmi [Multiplicatif!] Actuelle:

9.first: Débloquez la fonctionnalité Talismans! [Dans l'onglet Runes]. Une Amélioration Globale du Diamant.

10.name: Défi Sadique I || {{- value}} Complétions
10.flavor: Je suis désolé pour ce que j'ai déchaîné sur le monde.
10.restrictions: Reincarnate and reach the goal except run the first five challenges AT THE SAME TIME! Coin Production /e12,500,000.

per.1: ELO de base +100 pour sacrifier les fourmis! Actuel:
per.2: Récompense de Sacrifice de Fourmi +2% ! Actuel:

10.first: Débloquez le Palier de réinitialisation de l'Ascension !

11.name: Reduced Ants Challenge || {{- value}} Completions
11.flavor: The great Ant War of '21 wiped off all of the skilled ants.
11.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but only get free ant upgrades and from Challenge8/9 completions. FOR ASCENSION CHALLENGES YOU MUST CLEAR CHALLENGE 10 TO ATTEMPT THEM.
11.goal: But: Complete le Défi 10 [Défi Sadique I] {{value}} fois.

per.2: Vitesse de la fourmi x(1e5)^complétions ! Actuellement :

11.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the ability to open Tesseracts! You also get to toggle Corruptions ;)

12.name: Défi pas de Réincarnation || {{- value}} Complétions
12.flavor: Pour une raison quelconque, vous ne pouvez pas le faire.
12.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but you do not gain Particles and you cannot Reincarnate at all! Ant production ^0.5.
12.goal: But: Complete le Défi 10 [Défi Sadique I] {{value}} fois.

per.3: +1 Hommage au Cube par ouverture! Actuel:

12.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the mystical Spirit Power! Find these in the Runes tab. Increase Corruption Cap by 2 levels. Finally, unlock two new corruptions! ;)

13.name: Défi Tax+++ || {{- value}} Complétions
13.flavor: Bonne chance avec le fisc, camarade.
13.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal, but taxes are much higher and grow with challenge completions. Ant production ^0.23
13.goal: Goal: Complete Challenge 10 [Sadistic Challenge I] {{value}} times.

per.2: +6 maximum to Talisman Level Cap! Current:

13.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and unlock the power of the Hypercube! Increase Corruption Cap by 2 levels, to 9! Finally, unlock two new corruptions! ;)

14.name: Défi Pas de Recherche || {{- value}} Parachevés
14.flavor: La dimension qui n'a jamais dépassé l'âge des ténèbres. Beaucoup craignent même de mettre les pieds.
14.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but you do not gain Obtainium nor are any researches purchasable. Ant production ^0.2.
14.goal: Goal: {{value}} Coins, but get bonuses based on your best attempt.

per.1: +50% stronger effect on researches 1x1 through 1x5. Current:
per.2: +1 research purchased per roomba tick! Current:

14.first: Unlock 15 Researches, and a way to coalesce your power into the Singularity. Increase Corruption Cap by 2 levels, to 11! Finally, unlock two new corruptions! ;)

15.name: DÉFI SADIQUE II || {{- value}} Complétions
15.flavor: La pire atrocité qu'un homme puisse commettre est d'assister, sans angoisse, à la souffrance des autres.
15.restrictions: Ascend and reach the goal but you're stuck in all corruptions at level 11, and Ant production ^0.01.
15.goal: But: Complète le Défi 10 [Défi Sadique I] {{value}} fois.
15.first: Vous briseriez l'univers si vous le pouviez !
15.noGoal: Vous ne trouverez aucun objectif en vue, mais obtenez des bonus en fonction de votre meilleure tentative.

challenges.header: Le jeu de base est-il trop facile ? Essayez ces situations ! [Cliquez sur les icônes pour afficher les détails du défi !]

upgradeDescriptions.1: [1x1] You got it! +16.666% 3D Cubes from Ascending per level.
upgradeDescriptions.2: [1x2] Plutus grants you +1 Offering per second, no matter what, per level. Also a +0.5% Recycling chance!
upgradeDescriptions.3: [1x3] Athena vous accorde +10% d’Obtainium en plus et +80% d’Obtainium Auto par niveau.
upgradeDescriptions.4: [1x4] Vous gardez ces 5 et améliorations d’automation utile dans la fenêtre d’améliorations!
upgradeDescriptions.5: [1x5] You keep the mythos upgrade automation upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.6: [1x6] You keep the automatic mythos gain upgrade in the upgrades tab!
upgradeDescriptions.7: [1x7] Acheter chaque bâtiments de particules automatiquement dès que c’est possible.
upgradeDescriptions.8: [1x8] Acheter les améliorations de particules automatiquement.
upgradeDescriptions.9: [1x9] The research automator in shop now automatically buys cheapest when enabled. It's like a roomba kinda!
upgradeDescriptions.10: [1x10] Débloquer quelques outils pour automatiser les Ascensions ou peu importe. Un peu coûteux mais cool.
upgradeDescriptions.11: [2x1] You got it again! +9.09% 3D Cubes from Ascending per level.
upgradeDescriptions.12: [2x2] Raise building power to the power of (1 + level * 0.09).
upgradeDescriptions.13: [2x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.14: [2x4] Iris shines her light on you. The effect power is now increased by +0.01 (+0.005 if >1000 tributes) per level.
upgradeDescriptions.15: [2x5] Ares teaches you the Art of War. The effect power is now increased by +0.01 (+0.0033 if >1000 tributes) per level.
upgradeDescriptions.16: [2x6] You got it buster! +20 ALL max rune levels per level.
upgradeDescriptions.17: [2x7] Oui. +5 Exposant par niveau aux cristaux.
upgradeDescriptions.18: [2x8] Quantum tunnelling ftw. +20% global game speed.
upgradeDescriptions.19: [2x9] Unlocks new coin upgrades ranging from start of Ascend to post c10 and beyond.
upgradeDescriptions.20: [2x10] The rune automator in shop now spends all Offerings automatically, 'splitting' them into each of the 5 runes equally.
upgradeDescriptions.21: [3x1] Perhaps score will benefit you more? Gain +5% more score on Ascensions per level.
upgradeDescriptions.22: [3x2] The exponent of the bonus of Artemis is increased by 0.05 per level.
upgradeDescriptions.23: [3x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get 1 additional tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.24: [3x4] Plutus teaches you the Art of the Deal. The effect power is now increased by +0.01 (+0.0033 if >1000 tributes) per level.
upgradeDescriptions.25: [3x5] Moloch lends you a hand in communicating with Ant God. The effect power is now increased by +0.01 (+0.0033 if >1000 tributes) per level.
upgradeDescriptions.26: [3x6] Start Ascensions with 3 additional rune levels [Does not decrease EXP requirement] per level.
upgradeDescriptions.27: [3x7] Upon an Ascension, you will start with 1 of each Reincarnation building to speed up Ascensions.
upgradeDescriptions.28: [3x8] Well, I think you got it? Gain +1% of particles on Reincarnation per second.
upgradeDescriptions.29: [3x9] Add +4 to Reincarnation Challenge cap per level. Completions after 25 scale faster in requirement!
upgradeDescriptions.30: [3x10] You now get +40% Cubes and Tesseracts forever!
upgradeDescriptions.31: [4x1] You again? +5% more score on Ascensions per level.
upgradeDescriptions.32: [4x2] Gain +0.1% Rune EXP per second you have spent in an Ascension. This has no cap!
upgradeDescriptions.33: [4x3] For each 20 Cubes opened at once, you get yet another additional tribute at random.
upgradeDescriptions.34: [4x4] Chronos overclocks the universe for your personal benefit. (Rewards the same as others)
upgradeDescriptions.35: [4x5] Aphrodite increases the fertility of your coins. (Rewards the same as others)
upgradeDescriptions.36: [4x6] Raise building power to (1 + 0.05 * Level) once more.
upgradeDescriptions.37: [4x7] Adds +20 to ALL rune caps again per level.
upgradeDescriptions.38: [4x8] Gain +0.5% more Tesseracts on Ascension for each additional level in a corruption you enable.
upgradeDescriptions.39: [4x9] Instead of the multiplier being 1.03^(C10 completions), it is now 1.035^(C10 completions)!
upgradeDescriptions.40: [4x10] Athena is very smart (Rewards the same as others).
upgradeDescriptions.41: [5x1] Yeah yeah yeah, +5% score on Ascension per level. Isn't it enough?
upgradeDescriptions.42: [5x2] You now gain +4% Obtainium per level, which is not dependent on corruptions!
upgradeDescriptions.43: [5x3] Gain another +3% corruption-independent Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.44: [5x4] Blah blah blah Midas works harder (same rewards as before)
upgradeDescriptions.45: [5x5] Blah blah blah Hermes works harder (same rewards as before)
upgradeDescriptions.46: [5x6] Obtiens +5% d’Offrendes en plus par niveau!
upgradeDescriptions.47: [5x7] Obtiens +10% d’Obtainium en plus par niveau!
upgradeDescriptions.48: [5x8] When you ascend, start with 1 worker Ant (this is a lot better than it sounds!)
upgradeDescriptions.49: [5x9] When you ascend, gain 1 of each Challenge 6-8 completion.
upgradeDescriptions.50: [5x10] What doesn't this boost? +0.01% Accelerators, Multipliers, Accelerator Boosts, +0.02% Obtainium, +0.02% Offerings, +0.04 Max Rune Levels, +1 Effective ELO, +0.0004 Talisman bonuses per level, 0.00066% Tax reduction per level.
upgradeDescriptions.51: [Cx1] Wow! Bakery is open!!! Immediately unlock all automations in the cube tab, and researches as well.
upgradeDescriptions.52: [Cx2] These sugar cookies sure boost your blood sugar. Gain +1% global speed per level.
upgradeDescriptions.53: [Cx3] What a hearty snack. Gain +0.1% Quarks per level.
upgradeDescriptions.54: [Cx4] Pretty dry, but they suffice. Increase Offering gain by 1% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.55: [Cx5] An inventive take on the original chip cookie. Increase Obtainium gain by 1% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.56: [Cx6] These are a little more exotic. Gain +1 more raw score from Challenge 1 completions per level.
upgradeDescriptions.57: [Cx7] Yum yum! Now we're talking... or maybe not. Increase the cap of Cube Upgrades 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 5x1 by 1.
upgradeDescriptions.58: [Cx8] A bit festive! If there is an event, All Cube gain is multiplied by 1.25.
upgradeDescriptions.59: [Cx9] Quite sour for a cookie. But it increases your Ascension speed by 0.25% per level, so who is to complain?
upgradeDescriptions.60: [Cx10] Wow! Bakery had extra ginger from their christmas sale. Reduce the cost of buying Golden Quarks by 0.003% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.61: [Cx11] Edible but prone to mistakes. Adds 125 whole milliseconds to the tolerance of code 'time', and increases reward by +2% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.62: [Cx12] Platonic loves toffee. Octuple Obtainium and Offering gain in Challenge 15.
upgradeDescriptions.63: [Cx13] Brownie Cookies, the best of both worlds. Increase Regular Cube Gain by 1% based on owned Hepteracts (+3% per OOM).
upgradeDescriptions.64: [Cx14] Some say the Ant God itself penned these fortunes. When you gain a statue from Platonic Cubes, you gain two instead.
upgradeDescriptions.65: [Cx15] That's amore, but is quite a crumbful! Increase Ant efficiency by 0.4%. (Roughly every 200 Ants purchased doubles crumb production!)
upgradeDescriptions.66: [Cx16] You just wish you could have one more cookie baked by her. Gain 2x all Cubes until you purchase OMEGA.
upgradeDescriptions.67: [Cx17] What the hell are in these??? Anyway, Metaphysics Talisman level cap is increased by 1,337.
upgradeDescriptions.68: [Cx18] What the heck! These aren't even cookies. +0.01% Quarks per level purchased of this upgrade. +5% more at level 1,000!
upgradeDescriptions.69: [Cx19] Cookies that you'll never remember again. +12% Golden Quarks this Singularity.
upgradeDescriptions.70: [Cx20] The pinnacle of baking. Nothing you'll eat will taste better than this. Gain +0.01% more Octeracts on Ascension if every corruption is set to level 14.

cubes.howManyCubesOpen:
How many cubes would you like to open? You have {{x}}! 
You can input a percentage of cubes to open, for example: "50%" or "100%". 
You can start the input with "-" (put in a negative value) to put in a value, that will be saved, which means you open all cubes except the specified number (also works with %).

validation.notEnough: You don't have enough cubes to open!
validation.negative: You can't open a negative amount of cubes.
validation.invalidPercent: You can't open {{x}}% of your cubes...

descriptions.32: [2x7] Vous voulez faire cuire beaucoup de cookies à la place? Prolongez la minuterie maximale hors ligne de 4 heures supplémentaires par niveau!
descriptions.33: [2x8] Gain +11% more Multiplier Boosts from Mythos Shards per level.
descriptions.34: [2x9] Gain another +11% more Multiplier Boosts from Mythos Shards per level.
descriptions.35: [2x10] Gain ANOTHER +11% more Multiplier Boosts from Mythos Shards per level.
descriptions.36: [2x11] La puissance du bâtiment est 5 % plus rapide par niveau.
descriptions.37: [2x12] La puissance du bâtiment est 2.5% plus rapide par niveau.
descriptions.38: [2x13] Building power scales 2.5% faster per level.
descriptions.39: [2x14] Building power affects Crystal production at a reduced rate.
descriptions.40: [2x15] Building power affects Mythos Shard production at a reduced rate.
descriptions.41: [2x16] Start Reincarnations with automatic A.Boosts unlocked. Note: this research doesn't affect earning achievements.
descriptions.42: [2x17] Start Reincarnations with automatic Generators unlocked.
descriptions.43: [2x18] Start Reincarnations with automatic C.Upgrades unlocked.
descriptions.44: [2x19] Start Reincarnations with automatic D.Upgrades unlocked.

descriptions.48: [2x23] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 6-10. [Les coût d’améliorations varies entre 100 000 et 1e22 Particules]
descriptions.49: [2x24] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 11-15. [Les coût d’améliorations varies entre 1e30 et 1e60 Particules]
descriptions.50: [2x25] Débloque les améliorations de Réincarnation 16-20. [Vous voudriez peut-être attendre que le Défi 8 sois faisable!]
descriptions.51: [3x1] Taxation scales 5.0% slower per level. [Up to -50%]
descriptions.52: [3x2] Taxation scales 2.5% slower per level. [Up to -75%]
descriptions.53: [3x3] Taxation scales 1.25% slower per level. [Up to -87.5%]

descriptions.55: [3x5] Taxation scales 0.3125% slower per level. [Up to -96.875%]
descriptions.56: [3x6] Building Cost Scale is delayed by 0.5% per level.
descriptions.57: [3x7] Building Cost Scale is delayed by 0.5% per level.
descriptions.58: [3x8] Building Cost Scale is delayed by 0.5% per level.
descriptions.59: [3x9] Building Cost Scale is delayed by 0.5% per level.
descriptions.60: [3x10] Building Cost Scale is delayed by 0.5% per level.
descriptions.61: [3x11] Gain +50% of your best Obtainium per second AUTOMATICALLY!
descriptions.62: [3x12] Gain an additional +10% of your best Obtainium per second automatically.
descriptions.63: [3x13] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 2 seconds you gain +1 Obtainium per level.
descriptions.64: [3x14] If your Reincarnation lasts at least 5 seconds you gain +2 Obtainium per level.
descriptions.65: [3x15] Increase the rate of gaining Obtainium through Reincarnations by 20% per level.
descriptions.66: [3x16] Increase the maximum number of [No Multipliers] completions by 5 per level.
descriptions.67: [3x17] Increase the maximum number of [No Accelerators] completions by 5 per level.
descriptions.68: [3x18] Increase the maximum number of [No Shards] completions by 5 per level.
descriptions.69: [3x19] Augmentez le nombre maximum de [Coût+] complétés de 5 par niveau.
descriptions.70: [3x20] Augmente le nombre maximum de [Diamants Réduits] complétés par 5 par niveau.
descriptions.71: [3x21] Automatically gain completions for Challenge 1 while running a Reincarnation Challenge
descriptions.72: [3x22] Automatically gain completions for Challenge 2 while running a Reincarnation Challenge
descriptions.73: [3x23] Automatically gain completions for Challenge 3 while running a Reincarnation Challenge
descriptions.74: [3x24] Automatically gain completions for Challenge 4 while running a Reincarnation Challenge
descriptions.75: [3x25] Automatically gain completions for Challenge 5 while running a Reincarnation Challenge
descriptions.76: [4x1] Welcome to the land of expensive researches. Here's +10% Obtainium per level to help you out!
descriptions.77: [4x2] Increase the level cap of Thrift rune by 10 per level, and +2% EXP for that rune in particular.
descriptions.78: [4x3] Increase the level cap of Speed rune by 10 per level, and +2% EXP for that rune in particular.
descriptions.79: [4x4] Increase the level cap of Prism rune by 10 per level, and +2% EXP for that rune in particular.
descriptions.80: [4x5] Increase the level cap of Duplication rune by 10 per level, and +2% EXP for that rune in particular.
descriptions.81: [4x6] Vous avez pensé que les recherches précédentes coûtent cher ? Vous allez avoir besoin de ça ! [+10% Obtainium/niveau]
descriptions.82: [4x7] DÉBLOQUEZ définitivement la Rune de l'Intelligence Supérieure! [+%Ob / +Vitesse de la fourmi / Offres de base.]
descriptions.83: [4x8] Prendre une éternité pour mettre à niveau cette Rune SI? Voici +5 % d'EXP Runique SI par niveau.
descriptions.84: [4x9] Does the new rune kinda suck? Power it up! +0.5% level effectiveness for SI rune per level!
descriptions.85: [4x10] Gain +0.01% more Offerings per level per Challenge completion!
descriptions.86: [4x11] Yeah, going back to basics. +5% Accelerators/Level.
descriptions.90: [4x15] Runes don't suck at all, but why not make them even BETTER? +1% Rune Effectiveness/level!
descriptions.91: [4x16] A simple +5% Rune EXP for all runes!
descriptions.92: [4x17] Another simple +5% Rune EXP for all runes!
descriptions.93: [4x18] +1 Accelerator Boost per 20 Summative Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.94: [4x19] +20 Multiplier per 8 Summative Rune Levels, per level.
descriptions.95: [4x20] Gain +4 base Offerings from Reincarnations by purchasing this. Math Nerds will love this!
descriptions.96: [4x21] Ants slow? Add +0.0002 to Ant efficiency increase per Ant purchased per level.
descriptions.97: [4x22] Add +4 level to the first six upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.98: [4x23] Add +4 level to the next five upgradable Ants per level!
descriptions.99: [4x24] Is the Quark Shop too hot to resist? Get +1 Quark per hour from Exporting for each level!
descriptions.100: [4x25] Alright, Platonic is off his rocker. I don't expect you to get this but this will give +1 MORE Quark per hour from Exporting for each level!
descriptions.101: [5x1] Alright, you're past the big wall. How about adding +.001 to Inceptus Ant efficiency per level?
descriptions.102: [5x2] Gain +1 bonus level to ALL Ants per level! A rainbow attack!
descriptions.103: [5x3] Pray to Ant God for +5% sacrifice rewards per level!
descriptions.104: [5x4] You're beginning to feel like an Ant God (Ant God): +5% sacrifice reward per level!
descriptions.105: [5x5] Buy this and be able to run the first five Challenges 9,001 times! (Note that requirements scale a LOT faster after 75, and again after 1,000)
descriptions.106: [5x6] Engrave your talismans with Obtainium to get +0.03 Rune Levels per talisman level per level.
descriptions.107: [5x7] Refine your talismans with the powder of Obtainium to get +0.03 Rune Levels per talisman level per level again.
descriptions.108: [5x8] A simple trick makes your base Ant ELO increase by 25 per level!
descriptions.109: [5x9] A more convoluted trick makes your base Ant ELO increase by 25 per level again!
descriptions.110: [5x10] Gain +1% more ELO from Ant sources per level because why not?
descriptions.111: [5x11] Gotta go fast [+10 max Speed Rune Level per level, +1% EXP to that rune]
descriptions.112: [5x12] Double Trouble [+10 max Duplication Rune level per level, +1% EXP to that rune]
descriptions.113: [5x13] Newton's Delight [+10 max Prism Rune Level per level, +1% EXP to that rune]
descriptions.114: [5x14] Five-Finger discounts [+10 max Thrift Rune Level per level, +1% EXP to that rune]
descriptions.115: [5x15] Scientific Breakthrough [+10 max SI Rune Level per level +1% EXP to that rune]
descriptions.116: [5x16] Talismans have +0.015 Rune levels per talisman level per level. Levelception!
descriptions.117: [5x17] Talismans have another +0.015 Rune levels per talisman level per level!
descriptions.118: [5x18] For 'neutral' talisman effects, increase by +0.06 per level!
descriptions.119: [5x19] Gain +0.25% Wow! Cubes per level upon Ascension.
descriptions.120: [5x20] Gain another +0.25% Wow! Cubes per level upon Ascension.
descriptions.121: [5x21] Bend time to your will, making all ticks 2% faster each level.
descriptions.122: [5x22] Adds +2% Ant sacrifice reward per level.
descriptions.123: [5x23] Adds +40 base Ant ELO per level.
descriptions.124: [5x24] Unlock the automator for Ant Sacrifice! [Good luck buying this.]
descriptions.125: [5x25] Good luck, buddy. [+1 Export Quark/hour per level]
descriptions.126: [6x1] 6 rows? That can't be... You've angered Ant God (+1% Accelerators / level)
descriptions.127: [6x2] Ant God gets angrier (+1% Accelerator Boosts / level)
descriptions.128: [6x3] Ant God cannot believe your bravery (+1% Multipliers / level)
descriptions.129: [6x4] Add +1 extra level to Crystal upgrade caps multiplied by Level * Log4(Common Fragments + 1)
descriptions.130: [6x5] Unlock automation for Fortifying talismans! Activates every 2 real life seconds.
descriptions.131: [6x6] Turn some Ant Disciples against Ant God, giving +0.5% Rune Effectiveness per level.
descriptions.132: [6x7] Recruit a couple other Ants towards your side as well, giving +2 free Ant levels per level.
descriptions.133: [6x8] Using some coalesced Obtainium, you can make Ant Sacrifice 3% better per level.
descriptions.134: [6x9 lol] The funny number. Gain a +6.9% bonus to Blessing level.
descriptions.135: [6x10] Unlock automation for Enhancing talismans! Activates every 2 real life seconds.
descriptions.136: [6x11] It may be time to look back. Makes all ticks 1.5% faster each level.
descriptions.137: [6x12] Paying off Wow! Industries, they'll sponsor +1% Cubes per level towards your Ascension bank.
descriptions.138: [6x13] When you open Wow! Cubes you will get +0.1% tributes per level!
descriptions.139: [6x14] Make all Tesseract buildings produce 2% faster per level.
descriptions.140: [6x15] The first of a Tetralogy, this tome reduces the base requirements of Challenge 10 by dividing it by 1e100M! A must-read!
descriptions.141: [6x16] The Ant God has infiltrated your mind. Run away from your conscience! (+0.8% Accelerators / level)
descriptions.142: [6x17] Run... RUN FASTER from your nightmares! (+0.8% Accelerator Boosts / level)
descriptions.143: [6x18] Your resilience somehow gives you +0.8% Multipliers / level!
descriptions.144: [6x19] Your Obtainium gain is increased by 3 * Log4(Uncommon Fragments + 1) * level%! Why is this? I don't know.
descriptions.145: [6x20] Your knowledge from the ant war will help you automatically gain Mortuus Est Ant levels.
descriptions.146: [6x21] Feed your Disciples pure Obtainium to make your runes +0.4% more effective per level.
descriptions.147: [6x22] Feed your Ants their own crumbs to make them Log(Crumbs + 10)x faster!
descriptions.148: [6x23] Increase your base Ant ELO by 2.5% per level!
descriptions.149: [6x24] You will gain +0.03% more Offerings per level per level in the Midas Talisman!
descriptions.150: [6x25] Auto Challenge. Enough said. (Lets you automatically run and complete Challenges!)
descriptions.151: [7x1] A new row, old upgrade. Makes all ticks 1.2% faster each level.
descriptions.152: [7x2] Wow! Industries sponsors another +0.9% Cubes per level towards your Ascension bank!
descriptions.153: [7x3] Hey, I totally didn't steal this idea. You gain 12 tributes of Wow! Cube tier for every Tesseract opened.
descriptions.154: [7x4] Make all Tesseract buildings produce 3% faster per level. Hey, isn't that more than the last research tier?
descriptions.155: [7x5] Tome 2 of 4: How to win over the Ant universe. Another e100M Divider to Challenge 10 Base Requirement on purchase.
descriptions.157: [7x7] Gas, gas, gas. +0.6% Accelerator Boosts / level.
descriptions.159: [7x9] Somehow, I can't explain why, you reduce your taxes by 2% multiplicative, based on 3/5 * log10(Rare Fragments)!
descriptions.160: [7x10] Want a permanent Blessing boost? I know you do. A permanent +25% effect to all Blessings.
descriptions.161: [7x11] SIGMA KAPPA: +0.3% Rune Effectiveness each level!
descriptions.162: [7x12] More exponentiation! +0.0001% more Inceptus power per level!
descriptions.163: [7x13] Ant God's wanting blood: +2% Ant Sacrifice rewards / level
descriptions.164: [7x14] Spirit power still sucks, so add +8% power per level!
descriptions.165: [7x15] Gain 2x the Spirit buffs in Ascension Challenges!
descriptions.166: [7x16] < T I M E >: +0.9% faster ticks / level
descriptions.167: [7x17] Because of sponsorships, Wow! Industries is raising Cubes gained in Ascension by 0.8% per level.
descriptions.168: [7x18] Gain +0.08% tributes from Cubes per level. You know, you should expect it at this point.
descriptions.169: [7x19] +4% faster Tesseract Buildings / level. It's GROWING.
descriptions.170: [7x20] Tome 3 of 4: How to totally ROCK Challenge 10. e100m divisor!
descriptions.171: [7x21] You should know how this goes. +0.4% Accelerators / level
descriptions.173: [7x23]  Beaucoup d'un petit multiplicateur de +0,4 % par niveau
descriptions.174: [7x24] Epic Fragments boost Blessing power by 10% * Log10(Epic Shards + 1)
descriptions.175: [7x25] Automatically buy Constant Upgrades, if they are affordable! They also no longer subtract from your constant.
descriptions.177: [8x2] +Log10(Crumbs)% to Ant production per level. Pretty cool buff ain't it?
descriptions.178: [8x3] +666 Base ELO per level! Spooky number of the devil.
descriptions.179: [8x4] +0.04% more Offerings per level per midas level!
descriptions.180: [8x5] +1 Export Quark per hour per level, yet again.
descriptions.181: [8x6] +0.6% faster ticks / level because why not? You're already the speed of light.
descriptions.182: [8x7] +0.7% Cubes in Ascension bank / level, from dividends in Wow! Stock.
descriptions.183: [8x8] When you open a Hypercube, you also open 100 Tesseracts! (This works with 7x3, if you were curious.)
descriptions.185: [8x10] Tome 4 of 4: You need to prepare for your Ascent. e100m divisor!
descriptions.189: [8x14] Legendary Fragments increase Spirit powers by +15% multiplied by Log10(Legendary Fragments + 1)
descriptions.190: [8x15] Unlock Automations for all 5 of the Tesseract buildings.
descriptions.191: [8x16] +0.1% Rune Effectiveness / level. Does this even do anything at this point?
descriptions.192: [8x17] Each purchased level of Mortuus Est also increases Ascension Cube reward by +0.03%
descriptions.193: [8x18] +1% Ant Sacrifice Reward per level. Singularity HYPE.
descriptions.194: [8x19] Increases both Spirit AND Blessing power by 2% per level.
descriptions.195: [8x20] Gain +1 export Quark per level, and increases the max timer to redeem Quarks by 5 hours each!
descriptions.196: [8x21] +0.3% faster ticks / level, because you just can't wait to become the Singularity.
descriptions.197: [8x22] +0.6% Cubes in Ascension Bank / level. No one knows how. Bank error perhaps.
descriptions.198: [8x23] +0.06% tributes from Cubes / level!. Wow! Cubes really has a lot of manufacturing errors in your favor.
descriptions.199: [8x24] +10% faster Tesseract Buildings / level. THE ARISEN. WITH THE PRAISE OF THE SINGULARITY.
descriptions.200: [8x25] Gain the power of a thousand suns! +0.01% Accelerators, A. Boosts, Multipliers, Offerings, and +0.004% Cubes, +0.04 Max Rune level, +(level/400) max Talisman Level, +(level/200) free Ants, 0.000666% Tax reduction per level.

researches.thanksToResearches: Thanks to researches you automatically gain {{x}} Obtainium per real life second.
researches.hover: Hover over the grid to get details about researches!

upgradeDescriptions.offeringPotion: Instantly gain 2 real life hours of Offerings, based on your all time best Offerings/sec and speed acceleration!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumPotion: Instantly gain 2 real life hours of Obtainium, based on your all time best Obtainium/sec and speed acceleration!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX: Gain +4% more Offerings from all sources!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringAuto: Automatically pour Offerings into a rune. 1st level unlocks feature, and each level increases Offering gain by 2%. Every second, 2^(Level) Offerings are spent.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX: Gain +4% more Obtainium from all sources!
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumAuto: Automatically pour Obtainium into a research. 1st level unlocks feature, and each level increases Obtainium gain by 2%. Every Reincarnation, dump all Obtainium into research until maxed.
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge: T and R Challenges don't cause resets if retry is enabled and gain up to 10 completions per tick. Additionally, instantly gain T Challenge completions up to highest completed when exiting R Challenges.
upgradeDescriptions.antSpeed: Each level gives a 1.2x speed multiplier to all Ant tiers' production! (Uncorruptable!) Short and simple.
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab: This is a cash grab but it gives a couple cool stats. +1% production per level to Offerings and Obtainium.
upgradeDescriptions.shopTalisman: Débloquez définitivement un Talisman de la Boutique !
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass: Wow! Cubes is giving you a deal: Buy this totally fair Season Pass and gain +2.25% Cubes and Tesseracts per level when you Ascend!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeExtension: Using some amazing trick, you manage to increase your Reincarnation Challenge cap by 2 for each level!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome: The extended cut: This fifth forgotten tome gives you an additional 20 Million exponent reduction on the Challenge 10 requirement per level. Past 60 completions of Challenge 9 or 10, this will also reduce the scaling factor by 1% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Cubes wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Cubes, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.tesseractToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Tesseracts wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Tesseracts, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.hypercubeToQuark: Are your Quark gains from Hypercubes wimpy? Well, buy this for +50% Quarks from opening Wow! Hypercubes, forever!
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass2: Five times the price gouge, twice the fun! +1.5% Wow! Hypercubes and Platonic Cubes per level.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPass3: Okay, now this is just ridiculous. +1.5% Wow! Hepteracts and Octeracts per level!
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer: You know, those Ascensions are kinda slow. Why don't I give you a +1.2% speedup to the timer per level?
upgradeDescriptions.infiniteAscent: Okay, for an exorbitant amount, you can obtain the 6th rune, which gives +35% Quarks and +125% all Cube types when maxed!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator: The PL-AT can do addition in the blink of an eye. Not much else though. +14% Quarks from using code 'add' per level, the first level provides the answer and the final level does it automatically!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator2: The PL-AT X has improved memory capacity, allowing you to store 2 additional uses to code 'add' per level. Final level makes 'add' give 25% more Quarks!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator3: The PL-AT Ω is infused with some Unobtainium, which is epic! But furthermore, it reduces the variance of Quarks by code 'add' by 10% per level, which makes you more likely to get the maximum multiplier. It also has the ability to give +60 seconds to Ascension Timer per level using that code.
upgradeDescriptions.calculator4: The PL-AT δ runs at 4,096Hz, which is a huge improvement over previous models. Add attempts refill 4% faster per level! Final level adds 32 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator5: The PL-AT Γ model somehow performs more 'powerful' computations, whatever that means. +6 seconds of GQ Export timer per level. +1 capacity every 10 levels, with 6 more at final level!
upgradeDescriptions.calculator6: The PL-AT _ model was made by Derpsmith, before he was banished from the industry forever. Gain 1 second of Octeract per usage per level. Final level grants 24 additional capacity!
upgradeDescriptions.constantEX: The merchant has one last trick up its sleeve: It can augment your second constant upgrade to be marginally better, but it'll cost an arm and a leg! Instead of the cap being 10% (or 11% with achievements) it will be raised by 1% per level.
upgradeDescriptions.powderEX: Platonic himself gives you 2% better conversion rate on Overflux Orbs to Powder per level. This activates when Orbs expire.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer2: Okay, fine. Here's another +0.6% Ascension Speed per level, stacks multiplicatively with the first upgrade!
upgradeDescriptions.chronometer3: OKAY. FINE. Here's yet ANOTHER +1.5% Ascension Speed per level, stacking multiplicatively like always.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassY: This is even more insane than the last one, but you'll buy it anyway. +0.75% ALL Cubes per level.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassZ: This one is arguably very good. Gain +1% ALL Cubes per level, per Singularity!
upgradeDescriptions.challengeTome2: Vous trouvez les dernières pages du tome perdu. Il fonctionne de la même manière que le reste des pages, mais vous pouvez en avoir jusqu'à cinq de plus !
upgradeDescriptions.instantChallenge2: Completing an Ascension Challenge doesn't cause a reset (if retry is enabled) and you gain 1 more completion per tick per Singularity.
upgradeDescriptions.cubeToQuarkAll: First up on the menu, why not gain +0.2% Quarks from Cube opening per level?
upgradeDescriptions.cashGrab2: This isn't even as good as the original. +0.5% Offerings and Obtainium per level.
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerZ: Gain +0.1% Ascension Speed per level per Singularity. It needs a lot of fuel to power up.
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX2: Gain +1% Offerings per level per Singularity. Putting the Singularity Debuff industry out of business.
upgradeDescriptions.powderAuto: Your grandparents had to wait a full day for powder, but not you! Per level gain +1% of orbs to powder based on the conversion rate.
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassLost: One would be advised not to touch this. +0.1% Octeracts per level, whatever those are...
upgradeDescriptions.challenge15Auto: Your grandparents had to bend dimensions to gain Challenge 15 score, but not you! Updates Challenge 15 Exponent every tick while in challenge 15!
upgradeDescriptions.extraWarp: "Hey dude, get in this portal I built up last night in my shed!" said the Quack Merchant
upgradeDescriptions.autoWarp: With the power of Quacks Warp machine will now be able to go into overdrive
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept: Did you know that after 1,000 Quark Hepteracts, their effect is raised to ^0.5? The Seal disapproves. Gain +2% to the diminishing return exponent.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept2: After 1,024,000 Quark Hepts, their effect is raised to ^0.25!!! Nonsense. Gain +2% to all Quark Hept DRs.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept3: After ~100 million Quark Hepts, their effect is raised to ^0.16! Absolute rubbish. Gain +2% to all Quark Hept DRs, yet again.
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept4: Et quand ils t'ont tout donné, certains chancellent et tombent après tout c'est pas facile...
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily: Hey you. Yeah, you! Quarks make seal merchant happy. Get +5% more of them from code 'daily' per level.
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily2: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 20% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily3: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 15% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.shopImprovedDaily4: Gain 1 additional free Singularity Upgrade and 100% more Golden Quarks per use of 'daily' per level!
upgradeDescriptions.offeringEX3: Gain 2% more Offerings per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX3: Gain 2% more Obtainium per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.chronometerInfinity: Gain +1% Ascension Speed per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.01^level)
upgradeDescriptions.seasonPassInfinity: Gain +2% more cubes per level, multiplicative! (Multiplier is 1.02^level)
upgradeDescriptions.shopSingularityPenaltyDebuff: Derpsmith was so proud of your performance in the first EXALT that he wants to make your singularity debuffs weaker. At a cost. A big cost.
upgradeDescriptions.obtainiumEX2: Gain +1% Obtainium per level per Singularity!!!
upgradeDescriptions.improveQuarkHept5: This is 1/50 as effective as a normal improver. Why? Because of balancing...
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration1: Buying this charm grants +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration2: Newly fortified Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, giving +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration3: It turns out adding more Obtainium Dust makes your charm more powerful, go figure. +1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaGeneration4: What if you also added Quark Dust??? You will find out. +0.1% faster Blueberry Time generation per level, stacking multiplicatively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck1: Buying this charm grants +1 &#9752 Ambrosia luck per level, for more Ambrosia! Don't know what that means? You soon will.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck2: You get a slightly larger four leaf clover, giving +1 &#9752 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck3: You get a slightly greener four leaf clover, giving +1 &#9752 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.
upgradeDescriptions.shopAmbrosiaLuck4: You get a slightly 'better' four leaf clover, what ever that means, giving +0.3 &#9752 Ambrosia luck per level, stacking additively.

shop.header: Welcome to the Quark Shop. You can't believe what's in stock!
shop.cannotRefund: Cet article NE PEUT PAS être remboursé ! Soyez prudent.

perks.unlockedIn: You will unlock a whole new Perk in Singularity {{sing}}
perks.header:
The highest Singularity you've reached is the {{ord}} Singularity.
Here is the list of perks you have acquired to compensate the penalties
perks.description: (Hover for more details. Perks in gold text were added or improved in this Singularity)

xyz.hasLevel2: In addition to GQ and guaranteed free levels to GQ 1/2/3 at +0.2/+0.2/+1, you get DOUBLE the amount of free upgrade levels from the Daily Special Action!
xyz.hasLevel1: In addition to GQ and free upgrade levels, the Daily Special Action gives you additional free levels to GQ 1/2/3 at +0.2/+0.2/+1 levels respectively.
xyz.default: The Daily Special Action now rewards you with Golden Quarks and free levels for random Singularity upgrades, both scaling with your singularity count!

perks.unlimitedGrowth: +10% to Quarks gain and Ascension Count for each Singularity. Currently: +{{amount}}%
perks.goldenCoins: Unspent Golden Quarks boost Coin gain. Especially strong for first Ascensions of each Singularity
perks.generousOrbs: Overflux Orbs effect on opening Cubes for Quarks can now go up to {{amount}}%

researchDummies.hasLevel1: Vous conservez en permanence la Recherche Automatique
researchDummies.otherwise: You can Research using Hover to Buy

superStart.hasLevel3: You start each Ascension with 1 Transcension, 1 Reincarnation, 1001 Mythos, 1e100 Particles and 500 Obtainium
superStart.hasLevel2: You start each Ascension with 1 Transcension, 1 Reincarnation, 1001 Mythos, 1e16 Particles and 500 Obtainium

notSoChallenging.hasLevel3: You start each Ascension with 1 completion of Challenges 6 & 7 and 5 completions of Challenge 8
notSoChallenging.hasLevel2: You start each Ascension with 1 completion of Challenges 6, 7 and 8
notSoChallenging.hasLevel1: You start each Ascension with 1 completion of Challenges 6 and 7
notSoChallenging.default: You start each Ascension with 1 completion of Challenge 6

automationUpgrades.hasLevel4: You always have w1x4 through w1x8 and w2x10; r6x5, r6x10 and r6x20. Automation Shop is also automatically purchased!
automationUpgrades.hasLevel3: You always have w1x4 through w1x8 and w2x10. Automation Shop is now automatically purchased!
automationUpgrades.hasLevel2: Vous avez toujours w1x4 à w1x8 et w2x10.
automationUpgrades.hasLevel1: Vous avez toujours w1x4 à w1x8.
automationUpgrades.default: You always have w1x7. (Autobuyers for Particle buildings)

shopSpecialOffer.hasLevel1: You permanently keep 100 free levels of each Shop upgrade in the first row
shopSpecialOffer.default: You start each Singularity with 10 free levels of each Shop upgrade in the first row

perks.respecBeGone: Les talismans améliorent désormais toutes les runes à tout moment!

forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.hasLevel1: You permanently keep Ant autobuyers and start each Ascension with a Tier 5 Ant
forTheLoveOfTheAntGod.default: You permanently keep Ant autobuyers and start each Ascension with a Tier 1 Ant

automagicalRunes.hasLevel2: Runes autobuyer will buy Blessings, Spirits, Talisman Shards, Fragments and will level up Infinite Ascent
automagicalRunes.hasLevel1: Runes autobuyer will buy Blessings, Spirits and level up Infinite Ascent
automagicalRunes.default: Runes autobuyer will buy Blessings and Spirits

perks.exaltedAchievements: Unlocks new, very difficult achievements! They are earned differently from others, however...

perks.irishAnt2: Ants blessed with more fortunate luck of the Irish grant &#9752 {{i}} more Ambrosia Luck!

wowCubeAutomatedShipping.default: Automatically buy Cube Upgrades with each ascension, but only if you are in a Singularity Challenge.

perks.goldenRevolutionII: Golden Quarks are 0.2% cheaper per Singularity. Currently: -{{current}}% (MAX: -50%)

platonicClones.hasLevel1: Automatically buy Platonic Upgrades with each ascension, without spending Obtainium or Offerings, anywhere!
platonicClones.default: Automatically buy Platonic Upgrades with each ascension, without spending Obtainium or Offerings, but only in a Singularity Challenge.

perks.platSigma: Code 'add' refills {{counter}}% faster per level per Singularity. Currently: {{current}} (MAX: -60% Cooldown)
perks.midasMilleniumAgedGold: Every use of code `add` gives 0.01 free levels of GQ1 and 0.05 free levels of GQ3.
perks.goldenRevolution4: Every Octeract tick, convert 1 in {{gq}} GQ you would gain in this singularity to your balance automagically!

octeractMetagenesis.hasLevel1: Automatically buy Cube Upgrades with each ascension, no matter where you are!
octeractMetagenesis.default: Automatically buy Cube Upgrades with each ascension, but only if you are in a Singularity Challenge.

immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel2: After Singularity 200, Fast Forwards no longer work! Instead, multiply your GQ gain and divide your GQ buy cost by 8.
immaculateAlchemy.hasLevel1: After Singularity 200, Fast Forwards no longer work! Instead, multiply your GQ gain and divide your GQ buy cost by 5.
immaculateAlchemy.default: After Singularity 200, Fast Forwards no longer work! Instead, multiply your GQ gain and divide your GQ buy cost by 3.

perks.skrauQ: Multiply all Quark Gain by ((Singularity - 179)/20)^2. Currently: {{amt}}... Yes, it's that good.
perks.derpSmithsCornucopia: With blessing from the Derpsmith, every singularity grants +{{counter}}% more Octeracts!

toString.noMinimum: No minimal Singularity to purchase required

goldenQuarks1.name: Quarks en Or I
goldenQuarks1.description: In the future, you will gain 10% more Golden Quarks on Singularities per level!
goldenQuarks1.effect: Permanently gain {{n}}% more Golden Quarks on Singularities.

goldenQuarks2.name: Golden Quarks II
goldenQuarks2.description: Buying GQ is 0.2% cheaper per level! [After 50%, effect grows much slower]
goldenQuarks2.effect: Purchasing Golden Quarks in the shop is {{n}}% cheaper.

goldenQuarks3.name: Golden Quarks III
goldenQuarks3.description: If you buy this, you will gain Golden Quarks per hour from Exports. Leveling up gives (level) additional per hour!
goldenQuarks3.effect: Every hour, you gain {{n}} Golden Quarks from exporting.

starterPack.name: Starter Pack
starterPack.description: Buy this! Buy This! Cube gain is permanently multiplied by 5, and gain 6x the Obtainium and Offerings from all sources, post-corruption.
starterPack.effectHave: You have unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Obtainium and Offerings.
starterPack.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked a 5x multiplier to Cubes and 6x multiplier to Obtainium and Offerings.

wowPass.name: Shop Bonanza
wowPass.description: This upgrade will convince the seal merchant to sell you more cool stuff, which even persist on Singularity!
wowPass.effectHave: You have unlocked the Shop Bonanza.
wowPass.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked the Shop Bonanza.

cookies.name: Cookie Recipes I
cookies.description: For just a few Golden Quarks, re-open Wow! Bakery, adding five cookie-related Cube upgrades.
cookies.effectHave: You have unlocked volume 1 of the recipe book.
cookies.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked volume 1 of the recipe book.

cookies2.name: Cookie Recipes II
cookies2.description: Diversify Wow! Bakery into cooking slightly more exotic cookies, adding five more cookie-related Cube upgrades.
cookies2.effectHave: You have unlocked volume 2 of the recipe book.
cookies2.effectHaveNot: You have not unlocked volume 2 of the recipe book.

cookies3.name: Cookie Recipes III
cookies3.description: Your Bakers threaten to quit without a higher pay. If you do pay them, they will bake even more fancy cookies.
cookies3.effectHave: You have appeased the union of Bakers.
cookies3.effectHaveNot: You have not appeased the union of Bakers.

cookies4.name: Cookie Recipes IV
cookies4.description: C'est un petit prix à payer pour le Salut.
cookies4.effectHave: You have paid your price for salvation.
cookies4.effectHaveNot: You have not paid your price for salvation.

cookies5.name: Cookie Recipes V (WIP)
cookies5.description: La pire atrocité qu'un homme puisse commettre est d'assister, sans angoisse, à la souffrance des autres.
cookies5.effectHave: You have paid witness to the suffering of the masses.
cookies5.effectHaveNot: You have not paid witness to the suffering of the masses.

ascensions.name: Improved Ascension Gain
ascensions.description: Buying this, you will gain +2% Ascension Count forever, per level! Every 10 levels grants an additional, multiplicative +1% Ascension Count.

corruptionFourteen.name: Level Fourteen Corruptions
corruptionFourteen.description: Buy this to unlock level fourteen corruptions. :)
corruptionFourteen.effectHave: You have gained the ability to use level 14 corruptions. {{m}}
corruptionFourteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained the ability to use level 14 corruptions. {{m}}

corruptionFifteen.name: Level Fifteen Corruptions
corruptionFifteen.description: This doesn't *really* raise the corruption limit. Rather, it adds one FREE level to corruption multipliers, no matter what (can exceed cap). :)
corruptionFifteen.effectHave: You have gained a free corruption level. {{m}}
corruptionFifteen.effectHaveNot: You have not gained a free corruption level. {{m}}

singOfferings1.name: Offering Charge
singOfferings1.description: Upgrade this to get +2% Offerings per level, forever!

singOfferings2.name: Tempête Offrante
singOfferings2.description: Apparently, you can use this bar to attract more Offerings. +8% per level, to be precise.

singOfferings3.name: Tempête Offrante
singOfferings3.description: This bar is so prestine, it'll make anyone submit their Offerings. +4% per level, to be precise.

singObtainium1.name: Obtainium Wave
singObtainium1.description: Upgrade this to get +2% Obtainium per level, forever!

singObtainium2.name: Obtainium Flood
singObtainium2.description: Holy crap, water bending! +8% gained Obtainium per level.

singObtainium3.name: Obtainium Tsunami
singObtainium3.description: A rising tide lifts all boats. +4% gained Obtainium per level.

singCubes1.name: Flamme Cubique
singCubes1.description: Améliorez-le pour obtenir +1 % de cubes par niveau, pour toujours !
singCubes1.effect: Gagnez {{n}}% de Cubes en plus pour Toujours.

singCubes2.name: Incendie Cubique
singCubes2.description: Burn some more Golden Quarks! +8% gained Cubes per level.
singCubes2.effect: Gagnez {{n}}% de Cubes en plus pour Toujours.

singCubes3.name: Enfer Cubique
singCubes3.description: Even Dante is impressed. +4% gained Cubes per level.

singCitadel.name: Citadelle de Singularité
singCitadel.description: What a unique structual phenomenon... but it gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels!

singCitadel2.name: Citadelle de 'Singularité': L'édition réelle
singCitadel2.description: This actual Citadel gives +2% Obtainium, Offerings, and 3-7D cubes per level! +1% Additional for every 10 levels! Also sets the free level of the fake citadel to whatever level this is.

octeractUnlock.name: Octeracts
octeractUnlock.description: Hey!!! What are you trying to do?!?
octeractUnlock.effectHave: You have bought into the Octeract hype.
octeractUnlock.effectHaveNot: You have not bought into the Octeract hype.

singOcteractPatreonBonus.name: Platonic $ells out!!!
singOcteractPatreonBonus.description: You know that Patreon bonus? Yeah, that's cool and all, but what if it also boosted Octeract production by the same amount?
singOcteractPatreonBonus.effect: Octeract production is {{n}}% faster for every $10 per month on the Patreon! Same as the Quark bonus which already exists.

offeringAutomatic.name: Éclats de myrtille ! (WIP)
offeringAutomatic.description:
The legends are true. 
 The Prophecies are fulfilled. 
 Ant God has heard your prayers. 
 Let there be blueberries! 
 And they were good.

intermediatePack.name: Intermediate Pack
intermediatePack.description: Double Global Speed, Multiply Ascension speed by 1.5, and gain +2% Quarks forever. Yum... 2% Quark Milk.
intermediatePack.effectHave: You have upgraded your package to intermediate.
intermediatePack.effectHaveNot: You have not upgraded your package to intermediate.

advancedPack.name: Forfait Avancé
advancedPack.description: Now we're cooking with kerosene! Gain +4% Quarks stack with intermediate, +0.33 to all corruption score multipliers, regardless of level!
advancedPack.effectHave: You have bought our advanced package.
advancedPack.effectHaveNot: You have not bought our advanced package.

expertPack.name: Forfait Expert
expertPack.description: That's a handful! Gain +6% Quarks stack with advanced, 1.5x Ascension Score, Code 'add' gives 1.2x Ascension Timer.
expertPack.effectHave: You have switched to the expert provider.
expertPack.effectHaveNot: You have not switched to the expert provider.

masterPack.name: Pack Maître
masterPack.description: A tad insane. Gain +8% Quarks stack with expert, for every level 14 corruption, Ascension score is multiplied by 1.1.
masterPack.effectHave: You have mastered your inner chakras.
masterPack.effectHaveNot: You have not mastered your inner chakras.

divinePack.name: Pack Divin
divinePack.description: OHHHHH. Gain +10% Quarks stack with master, and multiply Octeract gain by 7.77 if corruptions are all set to 14.
divinePack.effectHave: You have found the reason for existence.
divinePack.effectHaveNot: You have not found the reason for existence.

wowPass2.name: Boutique Liquidation
wowPass2.description: The Seal Merchant needs to get rid of some exotic goods. Only for a steep price. I do not think that is how sales work.
wowPass2.effectHave: You have triggered the Liquidation event!
wowPass2.effectHaveNot: You have not triggered the Liquidation event!

wowPass3.name: QUAAAACK
wowPass3.description: QUAAAAAAAACK. The Merchant has gone crazy for your QUARKS!
wowPass3.effectHaveNot: You have not triggered the QUACKSTRAVAGANZA!!

potionBuff.name: Carafe à Potion d'illumination
potionBuff.description: Purported to actually be the fountain of youth, this item powers up potions considerably!

potionBuff2.name: Potion Decanter of Inquisition
potionBuff2.description: En regardant dans le miroir, vous n'êtes pas vraiment sur de ce qu'est cette potion

potionBuff3.name: Potion Decanter of Maddening Instability
potionBuff3.description: SHE'S GONNA BLOW!!!! Said Midas, the Golden Quark Salesman. Oh yeah, did we mention he's in the game?

singChallengeExtension.name: Bigger Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension.description: Need more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singChallengeExtension2.name: Biggerer Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension2.description: Need even more Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level.
singChallengeExtension2.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singChallengeExtension3.name: BiggererEST Challenge Caps
singChallengeExtension3.description: Need even MORE Challenges? Well, add 2 more Reincarnation Challenges and 1 Ascension Challenge to the cap, per level. Does it not seem excessive?
singChallengeExtension3.effect: You feel motivated enough to complete {{n}} more Reincarnation Challenges, and {{m}} more Ascension Challenges.

singQuarkImprover1.name: Marginal Quark Gain Improver Thingy
singQuarkImprover1.description: A doohickey that I forgot what it looked like. +0.5% Quarks per level, multiplicative with all other bonuses! Seems like it grows in cost a lot faster than anything else though. Also, did you know these descriptions can be arbitarily long?

singQuarkHepteract.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better.
singQuarkHepteract.description: Wrong game, oops. Anyway, would you like a very slightly better DR exponent on Quark Hepteract?
singQuarkHepteract.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract2.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better II.
singQuarkHepteract2.description: Toujours pas le bon jeu. Identique à la mise à jour précédente.
singQuarkHepteract2.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singQuarkHepteract3.name: I wish my Quark Hepteract was marginally better III.
singQuarkHepteract3.description: I AM NOT THE GODMOTHER YOU ARE LOOKING FOR, DYLAN!
singQuarkHepteract3.effect: The DR exponent is now {{n}}% larger!

singOcteractGain.name: Octeract Absinthe
singOcteractGain.description: You would have never known this tonic can boost your Octeracts! [+1.25% per level, in fact!]

singOcteractGain2.name: Pieces of Eight
singOcteractGain2.description: There is indeed eight of them, but each only gives +0.625% bonus, so each level gives +5% Octeract per level.

singOcteractGain3.name: The Obelisk Shaped like an Octagon.
singOcteractGain3.description: Platonic had to reach pretty far here. +2.5% Octeracts yeah!

singOcteractGain4.name: Octahedral Synthesis
singOcteractGain4.description: How does this even work!?? +2% Octeracts, you bet!

singOcteractGain5.name: The Eighth Wonder of the World
singOcteractGain5.description: is the wonder of the world we live in. [+1% Octeracts. Platonic, this is so stingy! but, he does not care one bit.]

platonicTau.name: Platonic TAU
platonicTau.description: Placed in the wrong upgrade section, this will remove any restrictions on corruptions or corruption level caps! Also raises 3d cube gain to the power of 1.01!
platonicTau.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicAlpha.name: Platonic ALPHA...?
platonicAlpha.description: Confusion ensues as to why there are two of these. This one is capitalized, so buying this ensures Platonic Alpha is always maxed!
platonicAlpha.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicDelta.name: Platonic DELTA
platonicDelta.description: Time follows you towards the future, after getting this bad boy. Gain +100% more cubes per day in your current singularity, up to +900% at day 9.
platonicDelta.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

platonicPhi.name: Platonic PHI
platonicPhi.description: Time follows you toward the past as well. Gain 5 additional free Singularity Upgrades per day in your singularity from code daily, up to +50 after 10 days.
platonicPhi.effectHaveNot: This upgrade has not been purchased

singFastForward.name: Etherflux Singularities
singFastForward.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive), and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count!

singFastForward2.name: Aetherflux Singularities
singFastForward2.description: Golden Quark gained by Singularity is increased by 100% (additive) and going singular at your all time highest count gives +1 singularity count! It's like Etherflux but with an A.

singAscensionSpeed.name: A hecking good ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed.description: Ascension Speed is raised to the power of 1.03, raised to 0.97 if less than 1x.

singAscensionSpeed2.name: A mediocre ascension speedup!
singAscensionSpeed2.description: Ascension speed is multiplied by 6 if you have not purchased Antiquities in your current Singularity.

ultimatePen.name: The Ultimate Pen
ultimatePen.description: You. It is you who is the author of your own story!
ultimatePen.effect: You do {{n}} own the Ultimate Pen. {{m}}

oneMind.name: ONE MIND
oneMind.description: A note, you found on the 'ground': seems like an advertisement for a cult. "Lock your ascension speed to 10x, and multiply all cubes based on the difference." Hmm...

wowPass4.name: QUQUQUQUAAKCKCKKCKKCKK
wowPass4.description: Deals that'll cost you a beak and a wing!
wowPass4.effectHave: You have quacked your last QUARK
wowPass4.effectHaveNot: You haven't quacked your last QUARK

blueberries.name: Blueberry Shards! (WIP)
blueberries.description: Blueberries! Yeah, Platonic is out of ideas. Well, each Blueberry gives a 0.01% chance per second to generate some Ambrosia!

descriptions.57: La production d'investissement est multipliée par 1e+7500.
descriptions.58: La production d'imprimantes est multipliée par 1e+15000.
descriptions.59: Coin Mint production is multiplied by 1e+25000.
descriptions.61: Welcome to Reincarnation! +5% Offering Recycle, +2 EXP/Offering!
descriptions.62: Completing Challenges, automatically or manually, increase Offerings gained in Reincarnation. Bonus subject to time multiplier!
descriptions.63: Crystal Production is multiplied based on Particles to the sixth power [Caps at 1e6000x].
descriptions.64: Mythos Shard Production is multiplied by your Particles squared.
descriptions.65: Multiply the gain of Particles from Reincarnation by 5x!
descriptions.66: When you use an Offering, every unlocked rune will get 1 free experience.
descriptions.67: Atom gain is increased by 3% per Particle producer purchased!
descriptions.68: Gain a free Multiplier for every 1e1000x increase in tax.
descriptions.69: Gain more Obtainium based on your particle gain. [Works with automation at a reduced rate!]

descriptions.71: Runes will gain (Rune Level/25) additional EXP per Offering used.
descriptions.72: Obtainium gain from Reincarnations is multiplied (1 + 2C) where C is #Reincarnation Challenges completed, up to 50x!
descriptions.73: Gain +100% free Accelerator Boosts and +10 free Crystal Upgrade levels, but only in Reincarnation Challenges.
descriptions.74: Obtainium gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Offerings. [Max: 100,000 Unspent]
descriptions.75: Offering gain is increased based on highest ever unspent Obtainium [Max: 30,000,000 Obtainium]
descriptions.76: Ant generation kinda slow? I agree! Make all Ant tiers 5x faster!
descriptions.77: This is Synergism, right? Let's make each purchased Ant make all Ants 0.4% faster.
descriptions.78: Gain an Ant speed multiplier equivalent to (1 + 0.005 * (log10(MAX Offerings + 1))^2).
descriptions.79: The Ant God will accept an arbitrary number of Particles in order to give you 10% more from sacrifices.
descriptions.80: The Ant God will accept a larger arbitrary number of Particles to give you more Ant ELO.

footnotes.buildings: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the corresponding tier starting from the top. Press [A] to buy Accelerator, [M] to buy Multiplier, or [B] to buy Accelerator Boost.
footnotes.buildings2: Appuyez sur [Flèche gauche] ou [Flèche droite] pour changer d'onglet. Apprécier!
footnotes.crystals: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5] to buy the respective tiered producer. Press [6], [7], [8], [9] or [0] to buy the corresponding Crystal upgrade starting on the left.
footnotes.mythos: Appuyez sur [1], [2], [3], [4] ou [5] pour acheter le producteur à plusieurs niveaux respectif.
footnotes.particle: Appuyez sur [1], [2], [3], [4] ou [5] pour acheter le producteur à plusieurs niveaux respectif.
footnotes.upgrade: Press [1], [2], [3], [4], [5] or [6] on your keyboard to use resources for each upgrades.

achievements.purple: Fond violet : non atteint, fournit un multiplicateur de bonus.
achievements.red: Fond rouge : non atteint, fournit un déverrouillage de contenu/fonctionnalité.
achievements.none: Pas de fond : Inachevé, rien de spécial.

footnotes.runes: Press [1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] on your keyboard to use offerings for each rune, starting with Speed Rune on the left; must have rune unlocked to use hotkey!

challenges.hotkey: Press [1], [2]... up to [0] to enter challenges 1 to 10. Press [E] to exit your Transcension or Reincarnation challenge if stuck!
challenges.finishTranscension: If you are unable to finish a Transcension challenge, press the hotkey listed above OR click on the red Challenge "C" button on the reset buttons on top.
challenges.leaveReincarnation: Pour quitter un défi de réincarnation, appuyez plutôt sur le défi gris "C" !

footnotes.research: Welcome to the future! Obtainium is gained through <<var(--green-text-color);|Reincarnations>>. I'd recommend studying the <<limegreen;|green-bordered>> researches first. The <<var(--crimson-text-color);|red-bordered>> researches are never reset whereas the <<white;|white-bordered>> researches will reset upon the next reset tier!
footnotes.shop: Survolez chaque partie de la boutique pour voir ce que fait chaque mise à niveau !
